type.name: Main
type.summary: Relative Strength Index (RSI) measures strength of the winning/losing streak over N lookback periods on a scale of 0 to 100, to depict overbought and oversold conditions. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.

type.name: Extended
type.summary: The Extended variant Relative Strength Index (RSI) includes RSI Divergence information. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window for RSI.
Number of periods in the HH/LL evaluation window.
Number of span periods in the fractal evaluation window.
type.returns: Time series of RSI values and Divergence information.
